summary: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.
cast: Brad Pitt|Sean Penn|Jessica Chastain|Hunter McCracken|Laramie Eppler|Tye Sheridan|Fiona Shaw|Jessica Fuselier|Nicolas Gonda|Will Wallace|Kelly Koonce|Bryce Boudoin|Jimmy Donaldson|Kameron Vaughn|Cole Cockburn|Dustin Allen|Brayden Whisenhunt|Joanna Going|Irene Bedard|Finnegan Williams|Michael Koeth|John Howell|Samantha Martinez|Savannah Welch|Tamara Jolaine|Julia M. title: El árbol de la vida
